attributes.action: put in place a facility for all politicians to pay back the monies that they have stolen from ordinary people by way of expenses.  It is not enough to apologise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am incensed that all those who have taken so much from us, unashamedly, feel that it will be ok to just say sorry.  They need to pay all the monies back, then possibly the country can get back on its feet again.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
